name: lower
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: lower
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to move something into a low position

example.eg: They lowered the coffin into the grave.
example.egtrans: 他们把棺材放入了墓穴。

example.eg: Heavily pregnant by now, she lowered herself carefully into the chair.
example.egtrans: 因为现在重孕在身，她小心翼翼地在椅子上坐下。

example.eg: He lowered his eyes (= looked down) in embarrassment when he saw me.
example.egtrans: 他看到我后尴尬地垂下了双眼。

dsense.name: lower
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: Interest rates have been lowered again.
Boil for five minutes, then lower the heat and simmer for half an hour.
example.egtrans: 煮上5分钟，然后调到小火再炖半小时。

example.eg: Please lower your voice (= speak more quietly).

trans_examp.trans_en: to make something worse than it was before

example.eg: Dale lowered the tone of the evening (= made it less socially acceptable) by telling a dirty joke.
example.egtrans: 戴尔讲了一个黄色笑话，破坏了晚会的气氛。

dsense.name: lower
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to behave in a way that makes people lose respect for you

example.eg: I wouldn't lower myself to respond to his insults if I were you.
example.egtrans: 我要是你就不会贬低自己的身份去理睬他的辱骂。

name: lower
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: positioned below one or more similar things, or of the bottom part of something

example.eg: the lower deck of a ship
Her lower lip trembled as if she were about to cry.
example.egtrans: 她的下嘴唇颤抖着，好像要哭的样子。

example.eg: I've got a pain in my lower (= the bottom part of my) back.
